definition: marked by or arising from malice, any of various units of weight used in southeastern Asia (especially a Chinese measure equal to 500 grams)
details:
adjective
- marked by or arising from malice
= example: marked by or arising from malice
= synonyms: cattish, bitchy
noun
- any of various units of weight used in southeastern Asia (especially a Chinese measure equal to 500 grams)
= synonyms: cattie
